title: Trump Picks Fights on Twitter, Pisses Off World: A Closer Look | John Early
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the latest fights President Trump has picked with the rest of the world as his approval ratings hit new lows.
Then, actor and comedian John Early talks about his small, but significant, role in Beatriz at Dinner and how a compliment from Salma Hayek set his nerves at ease on set. He explains how he became obsessed with Toni Collette at 11 years old before acting out a scene she performed in The Sixth Sense.
